messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

re please prepare for the new survey quarter if necessary re please prepare for survey quarter if necessary hi thank you for writing please be advised forward issue you experiencing our colleagues for proper investigation bear mind data quality criteria needs be for contacts would be main offer name segment type could you please be kind look into issue reported by below please let know if can assist further thanks customer care en sent tuesday please prepare for survey quarter if necessary hi need add few list but cannot find right way doing even editing contact does seem work please advise best regards sent tuesday please prepare for survey quarter if necessary hello we preparing for survey quarter october we want make everything place for your check your last survey results date go dashboard or we have reviewed your history we would recommend enter quarter please note your needs be surveyed least twice per year here your checklist or delegated confirms eligibility every quarter selects survey start date click here or below nominates contacts together with updates gives client heads up nominate contacts together with give clients heads up check contact info accuracy if needed use spreadsheet contacts upload spreadsheet customer care sends surveys reminders out integrated with sending address remember contacts need have send survey yes address name segment type main offer filled accountable for data validity respondents exist accountable for data accuracy namely contacts attributes correctly filled check your selected survey date visible only after or delegated responded survey download export refreshed daily help with accounts survey scheduling reminders follow next two weeks survey calendar also available you can check document here for further information about programme manager or you receiving notification because you assigned projects our please amend them if information inaccurate customer care update these please also note you need have client approval for sending surveys out case you have any questions or please contact customer care confirm eligibility copyright rights reserved please refer section our for list entities message was sent by old broad street click below

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT ticket**

I'm needing to categorize this IT ticket into one of the specified categories. The ticket description is lengthy and repetitive, focusing on tasks related to survey preparation, data quality, contacts, and scheduling reminders. It seems to align more with an "Internal Project" category since it deals with survey program deployment and administration. It's definitely not hardware, HR-related, or about access. So yeah, "Internal Project" seems to fit best here!**Formatting response in JSON**

I see that the answer needs to be in JSON format with the category labeled as "Internal Project." The prompt specifically requests this categorization, so I'll structure my response like this: {"category":"Internal Project"}. It seems important to keep it concise, and while I wonder if I should add justification, the instructions say to respond with just the category. So, I’ll deliver the response in the required format!
